description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A mix of real time strategy (RTS) and collectable card game (CCG) elements.  Play cards to build structures, train combatants, and cast spells. Fight for resources on a grid to grid combat system. Duel your friends online. Create a custom deck from over 120 cards. Make and share maps. Learn how to play from a set tutorial levels.  Grid Legion is easy to learn and difficult to master.  Version 1.5
